title: Selfie gone wrong leads to arrest
content:
St. Petersburg police have arrested a man after they say he fired his gun in the bathroom of a St. Pete nightclub on Friday.
Rorn Sorn, 34, reportedly went into the bathroom at Club Lust to take a picture of himself with a handgun. The gun was discharged and went through the wall striking the women's bathroom next door.
Sorn tried to flee but officers in the area were able to stop him. He was charged with being a convicted felon in possession of a firearm, possession of Xanax, and less than two grams of possession of marijuana.
